attributes.action: remove Steve Wright from from the BBC.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As license payers we are sick and tired of listening to the drivel spouted by this talentless self congratulatory radio presenter. We urge all sane like thinking license payers to end our suffering and sign this petition. Lets get rid of Steve Wright now!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
